decision_conditions: Not exceed the tree works approved
description: TPO 305 (T5) Lime Tree - Pollarding back to original points of growth, reduce crown by up to 3m to 12m height and 2m radial spread; to afford better light into garden.TPO 305 (T6) Lime Tree - Pollarding back to original points of growth, reduce crown by up to 3m to 12m height and 2m radial spread; to afford better light into garden as causing excessive shade, neighbour has complained about leaves in their garden.TPO 305 (T7) Lime Tree - Pollarding back to original points of growth, reduce crown by up to 3m to 14m height and 2m radial spread; to afford better light into garden.TPO 305 (T8) - Pollarding back to original points of growth, reduce crown by up to 2m to 10m height and 1m radial spread; to afford better light into garden.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
